attributes.action: Stop the big companies from removing the word EASTER from easter eggs !!
attributes.background: The supermarkets have confirmed that from Easter 2017 the big companies (Cadburys, Nestle etc ..) will be removing the word EASTER from easter eggs so as not to offend religious groups !!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The names which companies use for products is a matter for them.
